header.title: Welcome to TripleF - Your Gateway to Football Success
header.subTitle: At TripleF, we believe in empowering football talents, clubs, and scouts by providing a revolutionary platform that connects the football community like never before

About.title: We Unlock Chances
About.desc: TripleF is a cutting-edge social media platform developed by Dopmine technology, dedicated to revolutionizing the football industry. Our mission is to bridge the gap between talents, clubs, and scouts, facilitating seamless connections and unlocking endless possibilities

cards.title: Talent
cards.desc: Are you a talented football player dreaming of making it big? TripleF is your gateway to success. Showcase your skills, achievements, and potential through a professional profile. Connect with top clubs and scouts, receive offers, and take your football career to new heights.

cards.title: Coaches
cards.desc: Are you aspiring to explore new experiences in the field of coaching? Or are you looking to take your expertise to the next level? TripleF is your way to achieve your dream of leading the best and most prestigious clubs globally, showcasing your technical and leadership skills to reap glory and open the doors to your future

cards.title: Clubs
cards.desc: Clubs, are you searching for the perfect addition to your team? TripleF provides you with access to a pool of talented players from around the world. Discover new talents, evaluate their profiles, and make informed decisions to strengthen your squad.

cards.title: Scouts
cards.desc: Scouts, scouting talent has never been easier. TripleF offers you a platform to identify promising players, track their progress, and facilitate seamless player transfers. Connect with talents, collaborate with clubs, and uncover the next football sensation.

cards.title: Step One
cards.desc: Create an account and verifying your profile.

cards.title: Step two
cards.desc: Profile set up! Choose the right profile for you: talent, scout or club

cards.title: Step Three
cards.desc: Connecting with the creative community and share your first challenge
